definitions.definition: The sac of skin and muscle that contains the testicles in most placental ( boreoeutherian ) mammals .
examples: The female labia majora are homologous to the male scrotum .

definitions.definition: The pouch or volva of certain fungi .

main_definition: ( anatomy ) The sac of skin and muscle that contains the testicles in most placental ( boreoeutherian ) mammals .
secondary_definitions: ( mycology ) The pouch or volva of certain fungi .
